mean_cn: v. 超越（经验、理性、信念等）的范围，超过
mean_en: to rise above or go beyond the normal limits of (something)
word_etyma: trans横过 + cend攀爬  → transcend 超越
short_phrase: Souls transcend the world after death.
sentence: This pianist's beautiful music can transcend through cultures and the ages.
sentence_trans: 这位钢琴家的音乐超越了文化和年龄的界限。
